TextView.android:text: First of all, there are two features in this app: sharing screen and watching someone sharing screen. If you want to share your screen you must press the corresponding button on the main screen. After starting sharing screen you will get your ID. If you want to see someone's screen you must know his ID. So, you are suppose to enter it in a proper field after pressing the second button on the main screen, and press the first button from bottom. The settings menu is supposed to be used by a developers, who know server's IP and port. Also you can change your stream quality to have a better videos.
